epsilonEquals

public boolean epsilonEquals(Arc2d otherArc,
                             double epsilon)
Returns a boolean indicating whether this is equal to another Arc2d based on the supplied epsilon.

Parameters:
otherArc - Arc2d for which the equality needs to be checked
epsilon - double value based on which the comparison is done
Returns:
true if this is equal to otherArc false otherwise.

offset

public Curve2d offset(double offsetDistance,
                      int offsetSide)
               throws InvalidArcException
Returns Arc2d which is offset at a distance of 'offset' either on left side or right side of this. Left side / Right side being defined while moving in the direction from start point to end point. Use class variables LEFT_SIDE or RIGHT_SIDE defined in Curve2d to define offsetSide.

Specified by:
offset in class Curve2d
Parameters:
offset -
Returns:
an offset Arc2d
Throws:
InvalidArcException
